    public abstract class SimpleNoEdgesHiveToVertex<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends SimpleHiveToVertex<I,V,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Simple implementation of HiveToVertex when each vertex is in the one row of the input, and there are no edges in vertex input.
